Plot: Die-hard gamers compete to break world records on classic arcade games.
Title: The King of Kong: A Fistful of Quarters
Actors: Steve Wiebe, Mark Alpiger, Adam Wood, Walter Day
tomatoConsensus: The King of Kong is funny and compelling with more than a few poignant insights into human behavior. Director Seth Gordon presents the dueling King Kong players in all their obsessive complexity and with perfectly al dente observations.
